fragment: Arturo is sent to intimidate Mike into recanting his testimony against Tuco but is overpowered by Mike.
Gaff serves as the cartel's representative in a sitdown with Gus and rejects Gus's offer.
Gonzo dies while moving No-Doze's body from under a stack of cars in a junkyard.
No-Doze is beaten to death by Tuco for insulting his intelligence and authority.
Tortuga is beheaded by Tucos cousins and his head is attached to a tortoise as part of a bomb.
Ximenez smuggles cocaine from Mexico and carries cash back to the cartel.
Declan is a meth dealer who operates in Phoenix, Arizona and refuses to work with Walter and Jesse.
Emilio is Jesse's former partner in the meth business and is killed by phosphine gas in the RV.
Krazy-8 becomes suspicious of Jesse and forces him to take him to Jesse's new partner.
Tortuga is beheaded by Tucos cousins and his head is attached to a tortoise as part of a bomb.
Wendy is a meth-addicted street prostitute who associates with Jesse Pinkman.
Huell is Saul Goodman's bodyguard and executes various intimidation tactics.
Ed specializes in providing fugitives with new identities and new places to live.
Francesca is Saul Goodman's outspoken receptionist and secretary.
Kuby assists in facilitating the car wash sale and intimidates Ted Beneke.
Joey is the cameraman of the college filmmaking crew that Jimmy occasionally uses.
Phil handles the microphones and audio for the college filmmaking crew.
Cheri assists Joey's film crew and arranges hair and makeup for individuals appearing on camera.
